Text: Introducing Bob Frank USMA Pointer ResourcesHello Greg Its Bob Frank USMA and past President of the Houston West Point Society Let me add my name to the long list of those congratulating you Greg this email is to introduce my executive search firmPointer Resources Inc with the hope of arranging a conversation with you about the creative possibilities for working together Even if you have no immediate executive recruiting needs this may be the perfect time for us to get to know each other For years Ive practiced executive search and corporate recruiting here in Houston with assignments all over the US and Latin America Clients as large as Tenneco Oil and Compaq and as small as Emergingcom attest to my record Were small and very very effective No competitor can outgun me or underbid me From finding a top COO to building a department of I canand havedone it all And done it with an entrepreneurial twist Investment banking and competitive intelligence transactions are frequent corollaries to my work Your success at Enron is nothing short of impressive I imagine you may have a subject or two on your mind which may be worthy of explorationcan we talk sometime Greg Thank you for your consideration With best regards b o b f r a n k Robert S Frank President Pointer Resources Inc Houston mobile winmaildat
